dashboard.description: Inventory optimization, supplier performance, and demand forecasting

widgets.title: Inventory Alerts Overview
widgets.query: SELECT alert_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM inventory_alerts_materialized GROUP BY alert_type

widgets.title: Critical Stockouts
widgets.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory_alerts_materialized WHERE priority = 'CRITICAL'

widgets.title: Replenishment Priorities
widgets.query: SELECT store_name, product_name, ending_inventory, reorder_point, priority FROM inventory_alerts_materialized WHERE priority IN ('CRITICAL', 'HIGH') ORDER BY ending_inventory ASC LIMIT 25

widgets.title: Supplier Performance
widgets.query: SELECT supplier_name, performance_rating, lead_time_days FROM suppliers ORDER BY performance_rating DESC

widgets.title: Slow Moving Items
widgets.query: SELECT product_name, days_on_hand, ending_inventory FROM inventory_alerts_materialized WHERE alert_type = 'SLOW_MOVING' ORDER BY days_on_hand DESC LIMIT 15
